Bash(cd "/d/AI教學與專案實作/專案_學系探索遊戲" && python3 << 'EOF'
import subprocess
import sys

# 安裝 qrcode 庫（如果還沒安裝）
try:
    import qrcode
except ImportError:
    subprocess.check_call\([sys.executable, "-m", "pip", "install", "qrcode[pil]", "-q"]\)
    import qrcode

# 生成 QR CODE
url = "https://chatgpt3a01.github.io/college-major-discovery-game/"
qr = qrcode.QRCode\(
    version=1,
    error_correction=qrcode.constants.ERROR_CORRECT_L,
    box_size=10,
    border=2,
\)
qr.add_data\(url\)
qr.make\(fit=True\)

# 保存為圖片
img = qr.make_image\(fill_color="black", back_color="white"\)
img.save\("game-qr-code.png"\)

print\("✅ QR CODE 生成成功！"\)
print\(f"🔗 掃描此 QR CODE 可進入：{url}"\)
EOF)
